SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml

Class SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.AbstractSignServiceHandler
se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationHandler, HttpResourceProvider, SignServiceHandler
public class SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler extends AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
A SAML authentication handler that implements the SAML profiles stated in Sweden Connect eID Framework.

      Returns:
      a AuthnRequestGeneratorContext object
      Throws:

    • isSignMessageSupported

      protected boolean isSignMessageSupported()
      The SignMessage koncept should be supported by all IdP:s in the Sweden Connect federation.
      Overrides:
      isSignMessageSupported in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
      Returns:
      whether the SignMessage-concept is supported by the handler

    • resetContext

      protected void resetContext(@Nonnull SignServiceContext context)
      Is invoked to reset the context, i.e., to remove elements that were added by this handler. If overridden, the super implementation should always be called.
      Overrides:
      resetContext in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      context - the SignService context.

    • assertSignMessage

      protected void assertSignMessage(@Nullable SignMessage signMessage, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes, @Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Asserts that we received a signMessageDigest attribute if SignMessage was sent.
      Overrides:
      assertSignMessage in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      signMessage - the sign message that was requsted (may be null)
      attributes - the received attributes
      result - the processing result
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      context - the SignService context
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for errors asserting the sign message

    • wasSignMessageDisplayed

      protected boolean wasSignMessageDisplayed(@Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.saml2.response.ResponseProcessingResult result, @Nonnull List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes, @Nonnull org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest, @Nonnull SignServiceContext context) throws UserAuthenticationException
      Returns true if the signMessageDigest attribute was received.
      Overrides:
      wasSignMessageDisplayed in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
      Parameters:
      result - the processing result
      attributes - the received attributes (in generic format)
      authnRequest - the authentication request
      context - the SignService context
      Returns:
      a flag indicating whether the sign message was displayed or not
      Throws:
      UserAuthenticationException - for processing errors, i.e., the proof for a displayed sign message is illegal

    • setSadValidator

      public void setSadValidator(@Nonnull se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.SADParser.SADValidator sadValidator)
      Assigns the SADParser.SADValidator to be used when validating SAD attributes. If not explicitly assigned a validator is created using SADParser.getValidator(MetadataProvider).
      Parameters:
      sadValidator - the SAD validator
